name: Energy mix in the UK (DUKES, 2018)
title: Energy mix in the UK (DUKES, 2018)
description:
Primary energy mix in the United Kingdom by source. This is available in absolute terms of million tonnes of oil equivalents (Mtoe) and as a relative share of the total energy mix. 

Primary energy mix relates to the quantity of energy inputs to the system; thermal losses are not taken into account, meaning this does not represent the final energy share.

sources.name: Energy mix in the UK (DUKES, 2018)
sources.additionalInfo:
Primary energy mix in the United Kingdom by source. This is available in absolute terms of million tonnes of oil equivalents (Mtoe) and as a relative share of the total energy mix. 

Primary energy mix relates to the quantity of energy inputs to the system; thermal losses are not taken into account, meaning this does not represent the final energy share.

fields.name: Coal (Mtoe)
fields.description: Primary energy use from coal in the UK, measured in million tonnes oil equivalent.

fields.name: Oil (Mtoe)
fields.description: Primary energy use in the UK from oil, measured in million tonnes oil equivalent.

fields.name: Natural Gas (Mtoe)
fields.description: Primary energy use in the UK from natural gas, measured in million tonnes oil equivalent.

fields.name: Hydro, wind & solar (Mtoe)
fields.description: Primary energy use from hydropower, solar and wind in the UK, measured in million tonnes oil equivalent.

fields.name: Imports (Mtoe)
fields.description: Primary energy use that is imported to the UK, measured in million tonnes oil equivalent.

fields.name: Bioenergy (Mtoe)
fields.description: Primary energy use in the UK from bioenergy, measured in million tonnes oil equivalent.

fields.name: Coal (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from coal.

fields.name: Oil (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from oil.

fields.name: Natural Gas (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from natural gas.

fields.name: Nuclear (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from nuclear.

fields.name: Hydro, wind & solar (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from hydropower, wind and solar.

fields.name: Imports (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from imports.

fields.name: Bioenergy (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from bioenergy.

fields.name: Fossil fuels (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from coal, oil and gas (fossil fuels).

fields.name: Low-carbon (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from low-carbon sources (nuclear plus renewables).

fields.name: Renewables (%)
fields.description: Share of the UK's primary energy mix derived from renewables (hydropower, wind, solar and bioenergy).
